titleStmt.title: The humble petition, of the peacefull, obedient, religious, and honest Protestants of this Kingdome presented unto the honourable House of Commons, by Doctor Hynton, in their behalf the 7. day of January, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Hinton, John Sir, 1603?-1682.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
